document.masterDocTitle: Mite species (Acari) on blackberry cultivars in organic and conventional farms in Florida and Georgia, USA

Comments —
Phytoseius chanti
was detected in USA­ Florida ( Denmark 1966;
Denmark and Evans 2011
;
Muma and Denmark 1970
). It was found on
Quercus virginiana Mill
( Fagaceae ) ( Denmark 1966),
Calocarpum sapota (Jacq.) Merr
( Sapotaceae ), Cynadon dactylon

tr.td:
L: Larva; N: Nymph *: It was followed what is mentioned in the Phytoseiidae catalogue by Demite et al. (2020) considering
Galendromus ( Galendromus ) gratus (Chant)
as a junior synonym of
Galendromus ( Galendromus ) floridanus (Muma)
**: Erythraeid mites are ectoparasitic in their larval stage and predatory in their deutonymphal and adult stages (Goldarazena et al. 2000)
